events.message: I received the wrong size shirt and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized under Refund because the customer is requesting money back due to incorrect product size.
Support agent Emily has been assigned to handle the refund request regarding the wrong shirt size.
Hello! Iâ€™m Emily from customer support. I understand you need a refund for the shirt received in the wrong size.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item is unused and in its original packaging?
Thank you for responding. My order number is 987654321. The shirt is unworn and still in its original packaging.
We will start the refund process immediately and send you a prepaid return label for the incorrect shirt.
That sounds great, thanks! I appreciate the quick response and solution offered.
Your refund case has been resolved. You should receive the return label shortly via email.
We are following up to ensure you received the return label and that the refund process is proceeding smoothly.
We have closed your case as the refund was successfully processed. Please contact us if you need further assistance.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to your email. We appreciate your feedback on our service.
